alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 25 at 2:19AM MST until April 25 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM MST /9 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up from 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeastern Coconino, southern Apache, and southern Navajo counties, including Happy Jack, Winslow, Snowflake, Show Low, St. Johns, Window Rock, and Tuba City. * WHEN...From 8 AM MST /9 AM MDT/ this morning to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Trees are more susceptible to blowing down due to saturated soil conditions from snow melt. Areas of blowing dust may develop.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
